title: taliyah's r vs the rift herald
body: when the opposing team starts the rift herald in one of your lanes....lets just say its still clearing your friendly minion wave.... taliyah can cast her ultimate or r and wall in front of it....but it does no block.... like i said ever before it lunges and strikes.... i feel as though this is a change in the game riot could make... and would make more sense with the mechanics of the game.

replies.body: Y'know I've never actually seen or tried that before, does Rift Herald just ignore her ult wall completely?? I would think she would be stopped by that wall like everything else, if not I would definitely bug report that.
it does ignore it completely....i tried to report as bug but they told me to come here to boards...

To me, it sounds like he's describing the rift herald leaping towards a tower to smash a big hit on it, and over the wall rather than smashing into the wall. Whether or not walking is blocked by it, I'm not sure, but I would assume so.
just to clarify...its before it leaps when u have your friendly minion wave it has to kill first before the leap. she can use ultimate and it doesnt stop it lol
